meanings.definition: The third portion of the small intestine.
meanings.sent1: The ileum helps absorb nutrients from food.
meanings.sent2: Doctors examined the ileum to check for any issues.
meanings.sent3: The ileum decided to take a break from digesting food.
meanings.sent4: Her ileum was a treasure trove of essential vitamins.
meanings.sent5: The ileum, like a sponge, soaked up all the goodness from the meal.

meanings.definition: The last part of the small intestine.
meanings.sent1: After passing through the jejunum, food enters the ileum.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon focused on repairing the damaged ileum.
meanings.sent3: The ileum threw a farewell party for the digested food.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, the ileum was the grand finale of digestion.
meanings.sent5: The ileum, a loyal companion, completed the digestive journey.
